p.d: We meet four clergymen. Jules Rampini is a pastoral assistant and farmer in Luthern. Stanislaw Kilar is the local priest in Vira Gambarogno. Adam Pradela looks after nine churches in the parish of Sursés. Samuel Gabrieli is the minister in the neighbouring villages Onnens, Corcelles, Concise, Mutrux and Provence. Directed by: Patrick Léger (Switzerland, 2018)
